document.full_text: prime minister benjamin netanyahu said he would set forth his view of a future middle east peace in an address to congress on tuesday and reaffirmed israel would never return to its old, narrow borders.
document.title: netanyahu to outline peace vision in speech to congress
lines_and_colors: prime minister benjamin netanyahu said he would set forth his view of a future middle east peace in an address to congress on tuesday and reaffirmed israel would never return to its old, narrow borders.
